item.title: Marlena add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Marlena add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Marlena add a quote by Amelia Earhart
item.description: "Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace." -- Amelia Earhart

item.title: Marlena add a quote by Amelia Earhart
item.description: "I want to do it because I want to do it. Women must try to do things as men have tried. When they fail, their failure must be but a challenge to others." -- Amelia Earhart

item.title: Marlena add a quote by Amelia Earhart
Marlena add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something. Donâ€™t wait for good things to happen to you. If you go out and make some good things happen, you will fill the world with hope, you will fill yourself with hope." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Marlena add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Faith is taking the first step even when you can't see the whole staircase." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Marlena add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Life is an opportunity, benefit from it. Life is beauty, admire it. Life is a dream, realize it. Life is a challenge, meet it. Life is a duty, complete it. Life is a game, play it. Life is a promise, fulfill it. Life is sorrow, overcome it. Life is a song, sing it. Life is a struggle, accept it. Life is a tragedy, confront it. Life is an adventure, dare it. Life is luck, make it. Life is too precious, do not destroy it. Life is life, fight for it." -- Mother Teresa
